data.name: Viv Vision
data.description: Vision's synthetically created daughter, Viv bolsters her allied Bionic Avengers by generating Ability Energy and healing them so they can press the attack.

starItems.name: Viv Vision
starItems.description: Vision's synthetically created daughter, Viv bolsters her allied Bionic Avengers by generating Ability Energy and healing them so they can press the attack.

1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary target
Apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>, up to a max of <color=#86e619>5</color>, to the most injured ally

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>80%</color> damage.
Apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>, up to a max of <color=#86e619>5</color>, to the most injured ally.

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>110%</color> damage.
Apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>, up to a max of <color=#86e619>5</color>, to the most injured ally.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary target
If the most injured ally is a <color=#fff568>BIONIC AVENGER</color>, apply +<color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> instead

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage.
Apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>, up to a max of <color=#86e619>5</color>, to the most injured ally. If that ally is a <color=#fff568>BIONIC AVENGER</color>, apply +<color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> instead.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary target
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, generate <color=#86e619>2</color> Ability Energy for a random <color=#fff568>BIONIC AVENGER</color> ally that was not at full energy on start of the current turn

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>180%</color> damage.
Apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>, up to a max of <color=#86e619>5</color>, to the most injured ally. If that ally is a <color=#fff568>BIONIC AVENGER</color>, apply +<color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> instead.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>:
 > Generate <color=#86e619>2</color> Ability Energy for a random <color=#fff568>BIONIC AVENGER</color> ally that was not at full energy on start of the current turn.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary target
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for a random Vision ally

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>220%</color> damage.
Apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>, to the most injured ally. If that ally is a <color=#fff568>BIONIC AVENGER</color>, apply +<color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> instead.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>:
 > Generate <color=#86e619>2</color> Ability Energy for a random <color=#fff568>BIONIC AVENGER</color> ally that was not at full energy on start of the current turn.
 > Generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for a random Vision ally.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary target
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, gain an Assist from a random Vision ally

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>260%</color> damage.
Apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>, to the most injured ally. If that ally is a <color=#fff568>BIONIC AVENGER</color>, apply +<color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> instead.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>:
 > Generate <color=#86e619>2</color> Ability Energy for a random <color=#fff568>BIONIC AVENGER</color> ally that was not at full energy on start of the current turn.
 > Generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for a random Vision ally.
 > Gain an Assist from a random Vision ally.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>90%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, this attack cannot be blocked.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary target
Apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to the primary target

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> and <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, this attack cannot be blocked.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary target
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, on Kill, apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> and <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to all adjacent enemies

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> and <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>:
 > On Kill, apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> and <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to all adjacent enemies.
 > This attack cannot be blocked.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary target
Generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for <color=#86e619>2</color> random <color=#fff568>BIONIC AVENGER</color> allies that were not at full energy on start of the current turn

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>180%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> and <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>.

Generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for <color=#86e619>2</color> random <color=#fff568>BIONIC AVENGER</color> allies that were not at full energy on start of the current turn.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>:
 > On Kill, apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> and <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to all adjacent enemies.
 > This attack cannot be blocked.

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>210%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> and <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>.

Generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for <color=#86e619>2</color> random <color=#fff568>BIONIC AVENGER</color> allies that were not at full energy on start of the current turn.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>:
 > On Kill, apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> and <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to all adjacent enemies.
 > This attack cannot be blocked.
5.nextUpgrade:
Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns
Apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>210%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns and <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

Generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for <color=#86e619>2</color> random <color=#fff568>BIONIC AVENGER</color> allies that were not at full energy on start of the current turn.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>:
 > On Kill, apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns and <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to all adjacent enemies.
 > This attack cannot be blocked.

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns and <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

Generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for <color=#86e619>2</color> random <color=#fff568>BIONIC AVENGER</color> allies that were not at full energy on start of the current turn.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>:
 > On Kill, apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns and <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to all adjacent enemies.
 > This attack cannot be blocked.

1.description:
Attack primary target and all enemies in that character's row for <color=#86e619>60%</color> damage.

If this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>BIONIC AVENGER</color> allies, this attack is unavoidable.
1.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary target and secondary targets

2.description:
Attack primary target and all enemies in that character's row for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage.

If this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>BIONIC AVENGER</color> allies, this attack is unavoidable.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary target and secondary targets
Flip <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect to a positive effect for all allies

3.description:
Flip <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect to a positive effect for all allies.

Attack primary target and all enemies in that character's row for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage.

If this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>BIONIC AVENGER</color> allies, this attack is unavoidable.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary target and secondary targets
Apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color> to primary and secondary targets

4.description:
Flip <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect to a positive effect for all allies.

Attack primary target and all enemies in that character's row for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color>.

If this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>BIONIC AVENGER</color> allies, this attack is unavoidable.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary target and secondary targets
Generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for adjacent <color=#fff568>BIONIC AVENGER</color> allies

5.description:
Flip <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect to a positive effect for all allies.

Attack primary target and all enemies in that character's row for <color=#86e619>250%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color>.

Generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for adjacent <color=#fff568>BIONIC AVENGER</color> allies.

If this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>BIONIC AVENGER</color> allies, this attack is unavoidable.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary target and secondary targets
Flip <color=#86e619>2</color> negative effects to positive effects for all allies

6.description:
Flip <color=#86e619>2</color> negative effects to positive effects for all allies.

Attack primary target and all enemies in that character's row for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color>.

Generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for adjacent <color=#fff568>BIONIC AVENGER</color> allies.

If this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>BIONIC AVENGER</color> allies, this attack is unavoidable.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>100%</color> damage to primary target and secondary targets
Flip all negative effects to positive effects for self and all <color=#fff568>BIONIC AVENGER</color> allies

7.description:
Flip <color=#86e619>2</color> negative effects to positive effects for all allies. Flip all negative effects to positive effects for self and all <color=#fff568>BIONIC AVENGER</color> allies instead.

Attack primary target and all enemies in that character's row for <color=#86e619>400%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color>.

Generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for adjacent <color=#fff568>BIONIC AVENGER</color> allies.

If this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>BIONIC AVENGER</color> allies, this attack is unavoidable.

1.description: Whenever this character or a <color=#fff568>BIONIC AVENGER</color> ally gains Ability Energy, heal self and all <color=#fff568>BIONIC AVENGER</color> allies for <color=#86e619>3%</color> of this character's Max Health.
1.nextUpgrade: When this character or any <color=#fff568>BIONIC AVENGER</color> ally drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health for the first time, clear <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> and <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> on that character

2.description:
Whenever this character or a <color=#fff568>BIONIC AVENGER</color> ally gains Ability Energy, heal self and all <color=#fff568>BIONIC AVENGER</color> allies for <color=#86e619>3%</color> of this character's Max Health.

When this character or any <color=#fff568>BIONIC AVENGER</color> ally drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health for the first time, do the following:
> Clear <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> on that character.
> Clear <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> on that character.
2.nextUpgrade:
Gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Armor
<color=#fff568>BIONIC AVENGER</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Armor
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, <color=#fff568>BIONIC AVENGER</color> allies gain an additional +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Armor

3.description:
Whenever this character or a <color=#fff568>BIONIC AVENGER</color> ally gains Ability Energy, heal self and all <color=#fff568>BIONIC AVENGER</color> allies for <color=#86e619>3%</color> of this character's Max Health.

When this character or any <color=#fff568>BIONIC AVENGER</color> ally drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health for the first time, do the following:
> Clear <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> on that character.
> Clear <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> on that character.

Gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Armor.
<color=#fff568>BIONIC AVENGER</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Armor.
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, <color=#fff568>BIONIC AVENGER</color> allies gain an additional +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Armor.
3.nextUpgrade: When this character or any <color=#fff568>BIONIC AVENGER</color> ally drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health for the first time, apply <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> to that character and, in <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for that chartacter

4.description:
Whenever this character or a <color=#fff568>BIONIC AVENGER</color> ally gains Ability Energy, heal self and all <color=#fff568>BIONIC AVENGER</color> allies for <color=#86e619>3%</color> of this character's Max Health.

When this character or any <color=#fff568>BIONIC AVENGER</color> ally drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health for the first time, do the following:
> Clear <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> on that character.
> Clear <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> on that character.
> Apply <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> to that character.
> In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for that character.

Gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Armor.
<color=#fff568>BIONIC AVENGER</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Armor.
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, <color=#fff568>BIONIC AVENGER</color> allies gain an additional +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Armor.
4.nextUpgrade:
Gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Armor
<color=#fff568>BIONIC AVENGER</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Armor
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, <color=#fff568>BIONIC AVENGER</color> allies gain an additional +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Armor

5.description:
Whenever this character or a <color=#fff568>BIONIC AVENGER</color> ally gains Ability Energy, heal self and all <color=#fff568>BIONIC AVENGER</color> allies for <color=#86e619>3%</color> of this character's Max Health.

When this character or any <color=#fff568>BIONIC AVENGER</color> ally drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health for the first time, do the following:
> Clear <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> on that character.
> Clear <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> on that character.
> Apply <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> to that character.
> In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for that character.

Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Armor.
<color=#fff568>BIONIC AVENGER</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Armor.
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, <color=#fff568>BIONIC AVENGER</color> allies gain an additional +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Armor.
